title: Healing and Deliverance Prayers for Gays and Lesbians @ The Midnight Gate: Prayers to heal, cure and deliver from Homosexuality
description: This prayer manual presents uncommon information about the origin and the mystery of homosexuality with focus on prayer. The power of prayer is the power of God . The power of prayer is the power of the supernatural. It takes the power of prayer to accomplish the supernatural in the seemingly hopeless situation of an avowed homosexual. You may have tried many things while looking for a solution, here your search will come to an end. Get it from here. It is a battle. It is war. Shall we war!!!
author: Anthony O. Akerele
